loss_of_balance_desc: Difficulty in coordination and frequent stumbling while walking or standing.
vision_problem_desc: Sudden blurry vision or loss of sight in one or both eyes.
early_morning_dizziness_desc: Feeling lightheaded or faint right after waking up.
facial_weakness_desc: One side of the face drooping or difficulty in smiling.
extreme_fatigue_desc: Unusual tiredness and lack of energy throughout the day.
arms_weakness_desc: Difficulty in lifting or controlling one arm properly.
speech_disturbance_desc: Slurred speech or difficulty in forming words clearly.
severe_headache_desc: Terrible headache with no known cause, often sudden and intense.
lack_of_concentration_desc: Difficulty focusing, confusion, or memory loss.
critical_warning_message: üö® This is a critical warning sign. Seek immediate medical attention if experiencing this symptom.

fast_test_description:
üß† Remember F.A.S.T. for stroke recognition:

F - Face drooping
A - Arm weakness
S - Speech difficulty
T - Time to call emergency services

If you notice any of these signs, call emergency services immediately!
recognize_symptoms_early_act_fast: Recognize these symptoms early and act fast. Every minute matters.
learn_quick_stroke_recognition: Learn the quick stroke recognition method
educational_disclaimer: Remember: This information is for educational purposes only. Always consult with healthcare professionals for medical advice.
